subject: Re: Acoufelt Projects Page
preview: Hi Criselda,  We're glad to know it's working now.  Hope you enjoy the rest of your day!

full_threads.body:
Hi Criselda,

We're glad to know it's working now.

Hope you enjoy the rest of your day!

Hi Joy

It's working properly now. Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Lovely Monday!

Our apologies for the inconvenience. It seems the image didn’t automatically adjust to the full width as intended.

We’ve now fixed this, so any landscape image will display properly within the section in full width.

Could you please check if everything looks good on your end?

Feel free to let us know if you have any further questions — we’ll be happy to assist.

Hi Joy

I tried to upload one image, but it did not automatically change to full width. The images took up only half of the page.

See project below.

33 Queen Street Brisbane | Workplace Design | Acoustic Solutions

Thanks

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Hope you are doing great.

Just a quick update—we have successfully completed the following:

  1. Removed 'Full width image - bottom page'
  2. Bottom images are moved to a separate row as the text. If one of the bottom image is available (either left or right), it will automatically be full-width. We also renamed the fields.

Kindly check if that's all good on your end.

Please feel free to reach out anytime if you have more questions — I’m happy to help.

Hi @joy just sending in an update:

Removing 'Full width image - bottom page' - Done
Bottom images will be on a separate row as the text. If one of the bottom image is available (either left or right) it will automatically be full width. - Done

(Time: 60 mins)

Hi @whil. See requests from client for the Projects template:

  • Regarding #2, can you remove 'Full width image - bottom page'
  • For #3, can you make 'half width - image left' and 'image right bottom' same functionality as the above where we can upload either half width or full width regardless if there is a text available or not.

Hi Criselda,

Happy Friday! Just a quick note to confirm we’ve received your requests.

We’ll be working on this next week and will keep you updated as things progress.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime—always happy to help!

Hi Joy

Thanks for the update

Regarding #2, can you remove 'Full width image - bottom page' to avoid confusion as this longer serves a purpose.



For #3, can you make 'half width - image left' and 'image right bottom' same functionality as the above where we can upload either half width or full width regardless if there is a text available or not. The image should display once an image is uploaded to this section. Please rename the fields similar to the above screenshot.



Let me know if there's anything unclear.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com
(Time:120mins) dev+admin time

Hi Criselda,

Hope you are having a lovely day!

Apologies for the late update. We are happy to inform you that we've completed the following:

  1. Update 'Make An Enquiry' link so it takes you directly to the contact form.
    - DONE
  2. Update the template to make it possible for us to upload full width image in the event we're not uploading any half width image left and right?
    - We have updated the setup to show the image as full width if only one image is uploaded (regardless if it's the left or the right section)
  3. Image right bottom below. Could you also allow this to be shown in case we want to add another image?
    - Added another image option for the left column—same condition. If the text is available above, the image will not show.


Kindly check and let us know if you have any further queries.

Hi Joy

Thanks for the update.

I'll send a separate email about another website enquiry.

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Hope you are having a lovely Monday!

Just a quick update—we’ve passed your requests along to our team:

  1. Update the Make An Enquiry link
  2. Images template update request

We’ll keep you posted once these are updated later this week.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime!

Hi Joy

Following the email below, could you also update the template to make it possible for us to upload full width image in the event we're not uploading any half width image left and right? Tried to upload a full width but it doesn't show up on preview.



Same goes also for the image right bottom below. Could you also allow this to be shown in case we want to add another image?



Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Joy

Thanks for the update!

It's looking good now.

Just one comment - can you update 'Make An Enquiry' link so it takes you directly to the contact form. You can use the link below:

https://acoufelt.com.au/contact-us/#contact-form

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Hope you are doing well. Our apologies for the late update.

We have already completed the updates for the Projects layout and made adjustments to the copy.
This section is set up to hide the image (if there's one) when we add a copy to the right section. See reference screenshots below:

Kindly check and let us know if this is all good on your end or if you have any further queries.

Hi Joy

Thanks for updating the Featured Products. Looks good now.

Could we have the rest of the updates completed tomorrow?

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com
(Time: 200mins)

Hi Criselda,

We've fixed the Featured Products. Can you check if it's all good on your end?

Furthermore, we'll keep you posted once the other updates are completed.

Hi Criselda,

Our apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Yes - just to confirm, updates are currently in progress. We’ll also be looking into the Featured Products concern and will keep you posted as soon as we have an update.

Thanks for your patience, and let us know if there's anything else we can help with in the meantime!
